scene_target: Establish Kaelen's isolation and the failing state of the High Spire's magical defenses.
goal: Demonstrate the physical and spiritual decay of the wards Kaelen is sworn to protect.
conflict: Kaelen's sense of duty versus the undeniable reality of the wards' inevitable collapse.
end_condition: Kaelen confirms the wards are beyond repair and won't last the night.

recent_facts: The primary sky-glass anchor of the High Spire has developed irreversible internal fractures.
Kaelen's attempts to stabilize the wards with his own vitality have failed.
The surrounding valley is silent and consumed by void-influence.
Kaelen has confirmed the wards will collapse before sunrise.
